article_title: Law360's Weekly Verdict: Legal Lions & Lambs
article_text:
Law360's Weekly Verdict: Legal Lions & Lambs

Law360, Los Angeles (March 13, 2014, 10:39 PM ET) -- This week's stable of legal lions is led by a Texas attorney who played David to federal regulators' Goliath by helping a financial services company escape a securities fraud claim. Our legal lambs' loose lips got them booted from a patent-infringement suit, while another's alleged letter-forging earned him choice words from a district attorney.



Legal Lions



Baker & McKenzie attorney Elizabeth L. Yingling earned her spot among the lions when a federal judge on Wednesday dealt a major setback to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission...

To view the full article, register now.
